dict.acceptation: 类似的；同类的；相似的；同样的；
类似物；相像的人；相似物；

sent.orig: What was more, women with similar MHCs favoured the use of similar commercial perfumes.
sent.trans: 而且，MHC相似的女性喜欢用相似品牌的香水。

sent.orig: Nosodes help body to form a similar-Ab reactions and cured the disorder by this similar Anti-body.
sent.trans: 器官病理制剂帮助体内产生类似抗原抗体反应，以治疗此种失常所产生的抗体。

sent.orig: The government also cancelled large gatherings for sports, concerts and similar similar events.
sent.trans: 政府取消了运动会、音乐会以及类似的大型集聚。

sent.orig: This provides basis and guidance to de-plugging in similar wells of similar oilfields.
sent.trans: 该技术为同类油田类似井的油层解堵措施提供了依据和指导。

sent.orig: The government also cancelled large gatherings for sports, concerns, concerts and similar similar events.
sent.trans: 政府同时也取消咯大型的聚会，如运动会，音乐会和差不多的事件。
